about_the_game:
Element Fusion

The game features six basic elements (Light, Dark, Fire, Thunder, Ice, Wind) that players can freely combine. Different element combinations grant towers unique abilities. By strategically pairing elements and leveraging their unique synergy effects, you can build an increasingly robust and unbreakable defense system.

Team Cooperation

Up to 4 players can team up online to collaboratively devise defense strategies and fend off wave after wave of enemy attacks with your teammates.

Campaign Mode

In single-player mode, experience unique campaigns where each has different types of enemies and new defense towers. Successfully completing a campaign unlocks new towers. As you progress through each campaign, you'll become familiar with the game’s basic controls and mechanics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM

short_description: This is a minimalist-style tower defense game that is easy-going and relaxing, with a moderate level of difficulty. Build your tower formations to fend off enemies. It also supports online multiplayer, allowing you to team up and experience an unprecedented level of tower defense fun!
supported_languages: English, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
